text: Ivan Lavrentevich Ustinov (; 1 January 1920 â€“ 15 January 2020) was a Soviet intelligence officer. He had many posts in Soviet military counterintelligence, reaching the rank of general-lieutenant. He was Third Directorate of the KGB and Office of Special Divisions of the KGB for the Group of Soviet Forces in Germany. Ustinov died in Moscow on 15 January 2020 at the age of 100. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian centenarians Category:KGB people Category:Soviet military people
title: Ivan Ustinov
